snippet: I don't know whether to congratulate Karen Handel for her candor, or take up a collection to buy her spinning lessons (not the cardio kind).
abstract: I don't know whether to congratulate Karen Handel for her candor, or take up a collection to buy her spinning lessons (not the cardio kind).
lead_paragraph: When the Susan G. Komen Foundation cut off Planned Parenthood from breast cancer screening grants, it assured the press and angry donors that the decision was not political. The foundation also claimed that its new senior vice president for public policy, Karen Handel, who had railed against Planned Parenthood during her failed bid for the governor's job in Georgia, was not behind the defunding.

headline.main: Komen's Political Person Resigns Over Political Reaction to Non-Political Controversy

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Komen, Susan G, for the Cure
